channel.title: Posts on Prem's Blog
channel.description: Recent content in Posts on Prem's Blog

item.title: Music Scales
item.description: In music theory, Scales are fundamentals to start with. Scale is a collection of musical notes, Each scale will have 7 notes. There are 12 major scales in music as there are 12 notes in music(A, A#, B, C, C#, D, D#, E, F, F#, G, G#).

item.title: My first blog
item.description: I’m feeling really happy to start a blog. To share my daily moments and learnings with people. I recently got to know about HUGO which is a static site generator, through which I’m blogging now.
